home.home-subtitle: Vote on interesting topics, share your ideas and if you want to be a speaker - submit proposal
home.home-top-description: Some text that explain what is the page for. This page allows as to collect topic that conference's participants are interested in. It helps speakers to choose their subjects and us to choose those which fit your need.
home.login-info: You have to be logged in to vote for a topic or add your own proposition.

login.login-create-button: Log in or create an account
login.account-already-linked-to-email: You already have an account linked to {email}. Login with {link} to link new login method to your profile.
login.reset-password-email-sent: Password reset email has been sent. Check your mailbox.

add-form.description-field-label: Topic description (markdown syntax available, max. 700 characteres)
add-form.description-field-tips: Max length of text description - 700 characteres
add-form.radio-author-observer: I want to listen about it
add-form.radio-author-speaker: I want to talk about it
add-form.radio-speaker-info: By choosing this option, you're submit call4papers proposal. We contact you, if your proposal will be accepted
add-form.submit-info-1: Thanks for your submission! Your topic will be verified.
add-form.submit-info-2: it will show on the list as soon as it is approved.

topic.speaker: Speaker:
topic.tooltip-not-logged: You have to be logged in to vote
topic.tooltip-author:
Naughty naughty!
It's not fair to vote for your own topic.
topic.to-grab-info:
Would you like to present this topic?
Contact us via {email}

topics.empty-list-user: There is no topic propositions yet. Be the first one!

user.welcome-msg: You can vote on proposed topics or add your own proposition.
user.email-not-verified: Your email address is not verified.
user.verification-email-info: You should receive an email verification request, check your email box.
user.email-not-received: If you didn't receive an email:

error.auth/user-not-found: User not found. Check if given email address is correct.
error.error-occured: An error occured. Refresh your page or try again later.
